response.overview: The story of a young girl, Lily(Alena King) who falls in love with a boy, Matthew(Kenyon Wilson) and in spite of their friends disapproval, keep their relationship intact.  Lily is bullied by Isabelle(Madison Sturges) while Matthew is harassed by his friends(Jared Battle, Tristan Young) every day trying to separate them.  Matthew's father(J. Bernard Harmon) is an abuse alcoholic who threatens him and his mother(Clavetia Charles.
response.tagline: Love tries to overcome high school, friends and judgement from peers for two teenagers with different backgrounds.
response.title: To Bloom At Night
